metadata.name: Italian Aster
metadata.description:
I once was on a walk and someone had a whole small field of these italian asters next to their garden. To this day it's probably one of my top 5 favorite pictures. It was even once shown in a gallery in Barcelona.

This image is a part of the collection A Splash Of Nature, where my pictures (@pkabrt on instagram) were edited into a unique style of painted NFTs. Each picture is 1:1 creation. Only one of each physical paintings will ever be created. If the auction sells for over 1 ETH, please contact me on instagram so I can send you a physical copy.

The standard print sizes are 
40 x 50 cm or ~16 x 20 inches
80 x 100 cm or ~31.5 x 39.3 inches
Others possible as well
